title: Hagane Orchestra
synopsis: A group of young girls make a living by running an armored vehicle customization workshop in a desert town. They discuss different ways of promoting their business every day.
voices: ['Saitou, Souma', 'Sasaki, Hiroo', 'Mizuhara, Kaoru', 'Matsui, Eriko', 'Tsutsui, Erina', 'Satou, Azusa', 'Nakae, Mitsuki', 'Tokuishi, Katsuhiro']
staff: [['Oota, Masahiko', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Aoshima, Takashi', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Misawa, Yasuhiro', ['Music']], ['Katou, Hiroshi', ['Art Director']]]
